Command-Line Interface¶

rocks docs¶

Open rocks documentation in browser.

rocks docs [OPTIONS]

rocks identify¶

Get asteroid name and number from string input.

Queries SsODNet:quaero with the string input. The output is printed to STDOUT.

thisstr

String to identify asteroid.

verbosebool, optional

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

rocks identify [OPTIONS] THIS

Options

-v, --verbose¶

Show request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Required argument

Asteroid names or designations are queried case- and whitespace-insensitive.

rocks index¶

Create or update index of numbered SSOs.

The list is retrieved from the Minor Planet Center, at https://www.minorplanetcenter.net/iau/lists/NumberedMPs.txt

rocks index [OPTIONS]

The index is used for local asteroid name and number lookups. It should be kep up-to-date. If the index file is older than 30 days, a warning is displayed.

For all functions below, providing no argument triggers a selection from the asteroid index.

rocks taxonomy¶

Get asteroid taxonomic classification for a single minor body.

Queries SsODNet:datacloud with the string input. SsODNet:quaero is used to identify the asteroid from the input string. The output is printed to STDOUT.

thisstr

String to identify asteroid.

verbose : bool, optional

rocks taxonomy [OPTIONS] [THIS]

Options

-v, --verbose¶

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Optional argument

A taxonomic classification is highlighted based on the wavelength-range, classification method, classification scheme, and recency of the results. The values of each category are assigned points, and the classification with the most points is chosen. For details, refer to the Taxonomy section of the documentation.

rocks albedo¶

Get asteroid albedo measurements for a single minor body.

Queries SsODNet:datacloud with the string input. SsODNet:quaero is used to identify the asteroid from the input string. The output is printed to STDOUT.

thisstr

String to identify asteroid.

verbose : bool, optional

rocks albedo [OPTIONS] [THIS]

Options

-v, --verbose¶

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Optional argument

An averaged albedo value is output based on the available measurements. The methods of albedo determination are ranked. If two measurements are available for methods in the top ranks, these values are averaged. For details, see the Albedo section of the documentation.

rocks diameter¶

Get asteroid diameter measurements for a single minor body.

Queries SsODNet:datacloud with the string input. SsODNet:quaero is used to identify the asteroid from the input string. The output is printed to STDOUT.

thisstr

String to identify asteroid.

verbose : bool, optional

rocks diameter [OPTIONS] [THIS]

Options

-v, --verbose¶

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Optional argument

An averaged diameter value is output based on the available measurements. The methods of diameter determination are ranked. If two measurements are available for methods in the top ranks, these values are averaged. For details, see the diameter section of the documentation.

rocks mass¶

Get asteroid mass estimate for a single minor body.

Queries SsODNet:datacloud with the string input. SsODNet:quaero is used to identify the asteroid from the input string. The output is printed to STDOUT.

thisstr

String to identify asteroid.

verbose : bool, optional

rocks mass [OPTIONS] [THIS]

Options

-v, --verbose¶

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Optional argument

An averaged mass value is output based on the available measurements. The methods of mass determination are ranked. If two measurements are available for methods in the top ranks, these values are averaged. For details, see the mass section of the documentation.

rocks info¶

Print available data on asteroid.

Queries SsODNet:datacloud with the provided identification string or select asteroid from index.

thisstr, optional

Identification string for asteroid: name, designation, or number. If empty, the user can select the asteroid from the index.

mime{‘votable’, ‘html’, ‘text’, ‘json’}, optional

Mime-type of printed SsODNet:datacloud response. Default is json.

verbosebool, optional

Flag to print SsODNet request diagnostics.

rocks info [OPTIONS] [THIS]

Options

-m, --mime <mime>¶

Mime type of SsODNet response

Options

votable|html|text|json

-v, --verbose¶

Show request diagnostics.

Arguments

THIS¶

Optional argument
